item.title: Visualisingdata Census Twitter Network
item.description: An interactive network graph showing the connections of Twitter users who participated in the 1st data visualization census initiated by Andy Kirk, rendered with sigma.js and preprocessed with Gephi.

item.title: A Decade of Climate Change in the Guardian
item.description: Explore a decade of climate change, global warming, natural disaster, extreme weather, pollution and deforestation in the articles published by the Guardian.

item.title: Footballers Search Relations Network
item.description: An interactive network graph showing the relations of footballers based on Google searches as shown in knowledge graph information.

item.title: Programmers Search Relations Network
item.description: An interactive network graph showing the relations of programmers based on Google searches as shown in knowledge graph information.

item.title: Berlin Bike Routes Map
item.description: A map of Berlin, Germany showing 14 different biking routes through and around the city. Created with OpenLayers, Open Street Map and data from Senatsverwaltung für Stadtentwicklung und Umwelt.

item.title: Ballon d'Or 2012 Votes Network
item.description: An interactive network graph showing the connections between voters and voted players from the male FIFA Ballon d'Or vote 2012.

item.title: Evolution of Internet Users from 1990 - 2011
item.description: An animated evolution of Internet users across the worlds countries created with the D3 JavaScript library.

item.title: Real-Time World Map of Earthquakes
item.description: A geographic map of the world showing real-time data for recent earthquakes rendered with the D3 JavaScript library.

item.title: World Aid Flow, Transparency, Development
item.description: An interactive visualization looking at world aid flow, aid transparency, and development in receiving countries created with the D3 JavaScript library.

item.title: Exploit Database Platforms Spiral
item.description: A pack layout visualization of platforms sized by the number of exploits created with the JavaScript library D3 and data from the Exploit Database.
